page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
We asked the children at school how their fathers were employed. Here are the results:
Farming ... ..12 Manufacturing ... 10 Retail trade..10 Building trade... 3 Accountants .. 2 Publicans... ... 2 Carpenters .. 2 Transport... ... 2 Farm machinery 2 Architect... ... 1 Fireman ... .. 1 Soldier ... ... 1 Draughtsman .. 1 Gardener ... ... 1 Car salesman.. 1 Auctioneer.. ... 1 Milkman ... .. 1 Contractor.. ... 1 Cider factory. 1 Computer trade... 1 Policeman.. .. 1 Insurance agent.. 1
Six fathers were unemployed. Twenty mothers are employed and thirty eight are housewives. Quite a lot of parents are farmers because this is not an industrial area.
